mapper.sql: id, village_id, store_name, application_name, contact_number, store_adress, type_id, size, application_date, ins_id, ins_ymdhms, upd_id, upd_ymdhms, upd_eac, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into j_cooperation_application (id, village_id, store_name, application_name, contact_number, store_adress, type_id, size, application_date, ins_id, ins_ymdhms, upd_id, upd_ymdhms, upd_eac, del_flag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{villageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{applicationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} )

mapper.update:
update j_cooperation_application
village_id = #{villageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
application_name = #{applicationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_number = #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_adress = #{storeAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
application_date = #{applicationDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ins_id = #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ins_ymdhms = #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_id = #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
upd_ymdhms = #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_eac = #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)

update j_cooperation_application set village_id = #{villageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_name = #{applicationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_number = #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_adress = #{storeAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, application_date = #{applicationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ins_id = #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ins_ymdhms = #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_id = #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upd_ymdhms = #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_eac = #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)
mapper.select:
select ca.id as id,ca.store_name as storeName, ca.application_name as applicationName, ca.contact_number as contactNumber, size,v.village_name as villageName,ca.store_adress as storeAdress, ca.application_date as applicationDate,s.lable as typeName From j_cooperation_application ca,s_sys_data s,s_village v, ( SELECT village.village_id FROM s_village village, s_user_area ua WHERE ua.user_id = #{currentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and ua.area_id = village.province_id
and ua.area_id = village.city_id
and ua.area_id = village.county_id
and ua.area_id = village.community_id
and ua.area_id = village.village_id
) svua where ca.del_flag = '0' and ca.type_id = s.value and s.type = #{StoreType} and v.village_id = ca.village_id AND ca.village_id IN (svua.village_id)
AND v.village_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{villageName}),'%')
AND ca.store_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{storeName}),'%')
AND ca.contact_number like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contactNumber}),'%')
AND ca.application_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{applicationName}),'%')
AND ca.type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by ca.application_date desc
LIMIT #{startPage}, #{endPage}

SELECT COUNT(CA.ID) FROM j_cooperation_application CA,s_village v, ( SELECT village.village_id FROM s_village village, s_user_area ua WHERE ua.user_id = #{currentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and village.del_flag = '0' and ua.del_flag = '0'
and ua.area_id = village.province_id
and ua.area_id = village.city_id
and ua.area_id = village.county_id
and ua.area_id = village.community_id
and ua.area_id = village.village_id
) svua WHERE CA.del_flag = '0' and v.village_id = CA.village_id AND CA.village_id IN (svua.village_id)
AND v.village_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{villageName}),'%')
AND CA.store_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{storeName}),'%')
AND CA.contact_number like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contactNumber}),'%')
AND CA.application_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{applicationName}),'%')
AND CA.type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
